Package dat.backend.model.persistence

Class UserMapper

java.lang.Object
dat.backend.model.persistence.UserMapper
class UserMapper extends Object
This class contains all methods used to retrieve or alter userdata in the database. Every method in this class is static, and an instance of this class is never needed.

  • Method Details

    • login

      static User login(String email, String password, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      Method is used to log in users. It checks if a user exist with the email and password given, if it does it create a user object with the data from that row in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - user's email / functions as a username.
      password - Password matching the given email.
      connectionPool - Required to make connection to the database.
      Returns:
      User
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if there is no connection to the database or if the given email or password doesn't match any data in the user table.

    • createUser

      static User createUser(String email, String password, int phoneNumber, String address, String fullName, String role, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      The method creates a user and saves it in the database if all the checks are passed.
      Parameters:
      email - User email
      password - User password
      phoneNumber - User PhoneNumber
      address - User address
      fullName - User fullName
      role - User role : USER
      connectionPool - Required to establish connection to the database
      Returns:
      User
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - If there isnt connection do database, or if a user isnt created

    • getUsersForOrders

      static Set<User> getUsersForOrders(List<Order> orders, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This methods retrieves a Set of user objects from the database, who are owners of one or more orders from the given list.
      Parameters:
      orders - List of Order objects
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      Set of User objects
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - Is thrown if there is no connection to the database or if data is invalid.

    • getAllUsers

      static List<User> getAllUsers(ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      A method to retrieve all users from the DB to use on the all orders admin page.
      Parameters:
      connectionPool - is required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      a List of users
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - Is thrown if there is no connection to the database or if data is invalid.
